mapper.insert: insert into cafe_stock(stock_code, stock_productname, stock_detailname, stock_standard, stock_price, stock_image, delivery_number) values( (select NVL(max(stock_code),0) + 1 from cafe_stock), #{stock_productname}, #{stock_detailname}, #{stock_standard}, #{stock_price}, #{stock_image}, #{delivery_number})
